name: Richard Mass
description: .I am an open minded and easy going man, that take good care of his soul mate…i love any outdoor game.. like going to the gym, working puzzles, taking walks, reading..I have two kids which they are grow , Kenneth is 17years boy and Jenny is 15years… i have divorce my ex due to the fact that she cheat on me…i would like to find someone that is as passionate about life as I am! I have had a good life up to this point and I would like to find someone to share the rest of my life
